message: I want a list of tests that are run, passing and non-passing, but o don't care about the list of fixture directories
-v 1 doesn't list the tests that are run, and -v 2 lists every directory that gets checked for fixtures.
Sadly I'm just now getting into writing tests for my Django app, but I'm annoyed at the output
Is there any way to customize that output?

What do you need the info for? If you want to feed it into some kind of tool there are test runners that will format the results into an XML file (look up django-jenkins. or django-hudson if it hasn't been renamed).
Somebody patched django-nose to make the output of *that* a bit more configurable: https://github.com/jbalogh/django-nose/issues#issue/6
Pretty roundabout answer to your question, but it's all I could find
